arts.ttl: Dyche fumes at Man Utd goal, calls for VAR change
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche has called for VAR to be able to intervene when a corner is incorrectly awarded after Manchester United's controversial goal.

arts.ttl: Why Man Utdâ€™s â€˜Farcicalâ€™ Opening Goal vs. Nottingham Forest Was So Controversial
arts.sum: A Forest player poked fun at Man Utd via social media postmatch.

arts.ttl: Amorim on Forest draw: Utd would've lost last year
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim said Manchester United's draw with Nottingham Forest on Saturday was a game his team would have lost last season after Amad Diallo snatched a late equaliser.

arts.ttl: Video: Savona sends message to Forest fans after scoring against Manchester United
arts.sum: Nicolo Savona scored his first goal for Nottingham Forest on Saturday in a closely-fought 2-2...

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 2-2 Manchester United: Forest fall to late equaliser
arts.sum: But relief very quickly became pandemonium when, just two minutes later, Forest took the lead courtesy of Savona, and it felt almost poetic that the Italian would give the Reds the lead, given it was he who seemed to keep the ball for Unitedâ€™s first-half corner goal. In fact, so turbulent was the Aussieâ€™s reign that he averaged more than five changes to his starting line-up per game, conditions that many would deem unworkable for a vast squad trying to adjust to radically different tactics.

arts.ttl: Dyche proud of Forest performance against Man Utd
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest boss Sean Dyche is proud of his side's performance in their 2-2 draw against Manchester United in the Premier League at the City Ground.

arts.ttl: Amad stunner earns Man United a point at City Ground after Forest turnaround
arts.sum: Amad Diallo's stunning volley earns Manchester United a point at the City Ground on Saturday afternoon, as the Red Devils play out a 2-2 draw with Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Rio Ferdinand knew Amad Diallo was so important for Ruben Amorim long before wonder goal vs Forest

arts.ttl: Manchester United player ratings vs Nottingham Forest as two underwhelm and three excel
arts.athr: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Patrick Austen-Hardy, Aaron Morris, Steven Railston)
arts.sum: Here's how Ruben Amorim's side fared as Manchester United were held to a 2-2 draw by Nottingham Forest at the City Ground in the Premier League, as their winning streak came to an end
